% Following shows a function call for which the output is pasted below.
% allRankedLists shows the results of 4 classifiers, each showing
% two rows, first row with classificatio (1 correct, -1 incorrect) and
% second row the svm probability estimate.
% This is just an example of many possible configurations.
% The mean average precision is shown under the colunms.

EDU>> generateThedocument(0,'opp','-b 1 -q 1 -t 0', 200, 100, 5);
